title: Nerf Graves....AGAIN
body: Can we please get this broken %%%% out of the jungle already. Is riot not content with having the most cancerous game and community then to STILL not nerf this guy and remove his ability to jungle. Can you PRETEND FOR A MOMENT that you are good game designers and fix this or is it time for other games to pass you up....your choice riot

replies.body:
Should have prefaced with "In my unhumble opinion..."

But all joking aside, yea I hate the state they've left Graves in too.

If you want changes you ought to go about addressing the issue in a kinder manner, or at least show less disdain for Riot. They usually ignores posts that look like rants.

Yeah you see I TRY that shit and they dont take me seriously..plus after all their bad decisions do they deserve respect...still got yasuo with his broken ass shield and wall that block ALL projectiles. They couldnt even know what its LIKE to be good designers if thats been floating around until now. Fuck em

This is an internet forum. If you want to draw attention to a problem you must first gather support and spark debate, and second have the post written in a manner that will not drive away people who could otherwise take note of your topic and potentially enact changes based on it.

Oh yeah thats works anywhere else...sadly the fuckers just say some shit about pokemon or talk shit saying I main sona or something even though I dont but she was the first champ I got. No they dont they just talk to in place of not actually having a fucking point to make....its League of Legends man

The nerf must not have done much, because I still see him almost every game in the jungle, and he still seems just as hard to deal with. He's pretty much an ADC juggernaut at this point, which is honestly ridiculous.
Are you implying that you're a better game designer???

If I pursued it I would have been the best one in the fucking world but come on my fucking tree out back can make better decisions then these freaking highschool drop outs. It is a wonder the game is been doing worse every day

Well then why not pursue it? Considering it only takes a little time to get better than riot at game design. I mean, your tree is already better than them. Not to mention that apparently you're not as good as your tree at game design. That's a bit sad.
because maybe I lost interest in game design

We removed grave's cigar, how he's a healthier champion. He now has more skill animation cancels that are super easy to do and he can miss everything in his kit, but his ultimate still somehow kills you well being tanky enough with life steal passive :'3
